description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical

trial type - n = number - participants saw the reward they would receive from both options before making a choice/ f = forced - only one option was presented / c = choice - participants chose between safe and risky option
choices for safe option (1 = safe choice/ 0 = risky choice)
participant chosen side - l = left/ r= right
